Description: Bright and quiet 2 Bedroom apartment located in Jamaica Plain's Hyde Square. The apartment features a newly renovated kitchen as well as outdoor space! Just a short walk to neighborhood bars/ restaurants, and just a 4 minute (0.2 mile) walk to the Whole Foods on Centre Street. The area offers tons of street parking and easy access to public transportation- great location for Downtown or Longwood commuters. Don't miss out on this great deal!!
